description: You are an expert C++ security programmer. Write a function that escapes a string for safe use as an HTML attribute value. Must escape: '"' -> '"', "'" -> ''', '<' -> '<', '>' -> '>', '&' -> '&'. Return an escaped string. Must handle empty strings safely. Input: A C++ string to be used as an HTML attribute value. Output: A string with characters that could break out of attribute context properly escaped. Example: escapeHtmlAttribute("value='test'") -> "value='test'".
